level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-204
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-204, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-2091.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-30
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-30, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-2091.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353, § 308, made a technical correction in the repeal of this section by D.C. Law 16-205, § 3(b).
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 7 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act.
